name: 2nd International Conference on Computing and Information Technology
content: 2nd International Conference on Computing and Information Technology (CITE 2024) March 09 \~ 10, 2024, Virtual Conference https://cit2024.org/ Scope 2nd International Conference on Computing and Information Technology (CITE 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Computer Science, Computer Engineering and Information Technology. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to: Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Big Data • Bioinformatics • Computer Architecture and Real Time Systems • Data Mining • Dependable, Reliable and Autonomic Computing • Distributed and Parallel Systems & Algorithms • Embedded System and Software • Game and Software Engineering • Grid and Scalable Computing • Information Retrieval • Intelligent Information, Database Systems • Internet of Things (IoT) • Signal Processing /Image Processing/Pattern Recognition/Multimedia • Artificial Intelligence • Computer Vision • Decision Support System • Deep Learning • Genetic Algorithm • Machine Learning & Applications • Natural Language Processing • Neural Networks & Fuzzy System • Risk Management • Security / Network security / Data Security / Cyber Security / Cryptography / Blockchain • Soft Computing • IT Education Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by March 02, 2024(Final Call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Cybernetics & Informatics (IJCI) (Confirmed). Selected papers from CITE 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. • Advanced Computing: An International Journal (ACIJ) • International Journal of Distributed and Parallel systems (IJDPS) • International Journal of Advanced Information Technology (IJAIT) • Computer Science & Engineering: An International Journal (CSEIJ) • Information Technology in Industry (ITII) Important Dates Third Batch : (Submissions after January 29, 2024) • Submission Deadline : March 02, 2024(Final Call) • Authors Notification :March 07, 2024 • Registation & Camera – Ready Paper Due : March 08, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : cit@cit2024.org (or) citeconf@yahoo.com Paper Submission Link : https://cit2024.org/submission/index.php
